messages.message: Hey team, any tips on when job-service is unable to connect with api-server for localhost? I've been getting the following error when trying to launch celery-app-tasks, but they haven't gotten past job-service. I've recompiled and restarted job-service and api-server (--as-docker --use-prebuilt and without --use-prebuilt), and the problem still persists
you need to add `"service_apiserver_host": "docker.for.mac.localhost",` to the `docker-local` section in `shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local.json`

you may ask, why isnâ€™t this in master? good question! i forgot that `job-service` calls `api-server` and removed this line when i fixed other issues with running services in docker in https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/43180 :sweat_smile:

i can create a PR to add this line to env-local.json after my walk with Prince
